bug.author: abuccts
bug.summary: Open large log will crash browser tab
bug.description: Submit a job with command yes, wait for 10 minutes, click "Stdout", "View full log", "Stderr", "View full log", "Stdout+Stderr", "View full log", "Show all logs" in sequence, then wait for 2 minutes, all related browser tabs will crash probably. Submit a job with command yes, wait for 1 minute, click "Stdout". "View full log", the log will be opened in a new tab; Submit another job with command cat /dev/urandom, wait for 1 minute, click "Stdout". "View full log", the log will be prompted as a download file.
